privacyPolicy.heading: Effective Date: [18-10-2023]
text: This Privacy Policy outlines how DevDock collects, uses, and shares personal data when you visit our website at devdock.tech (referred to as the "Site"). Your use of the site signifies your agreement to the terms of this privacy policy.

privacyPolicy.heading: Collection of Personal Data
text: Contact Information: When you interact with the site or contact DevDock through the provided channels, we may collect personal information, including your name, email address, phone number, or other contact details.

Cookies and Usage Data: DevDock may employ cookies and similar tracking technologies to gather information about your browsing activities on the site. This may encompass your IP address, browser type, operating system, referral source, pages visited, and other usage details.

privacyPolicy.heading: Use of Personal Data
text: Provide and Improve Services: DevDock utilizes the collected personal data to offer and enhance our services, address your inquiries, and keep you informed about our offerings.
Personalization: The information gathered may be used to personalize your site experience and deliver tailored content and advertisements based on your preferences.
Analytics and Metrics: DevDock analyzes usage data to comprehend how visitors interact with the site, recognize trends, and enhance our website's functionality and performance.

Communication: DevDock might use your contact information to send you newsletters, promotional materials, or other communications pertaining to our services. You can opt out of receiving such communications at any time.

privacyPolicy.heading: Data Sharing
text: Service Providers: DevDock may engage third-party service providers to perform various functions on our behalf, including website hosting, data analysis, marketing assistance, and customer support. These service providers may have access to personal data to the extent necessary to fulfill their duties.
Legal Compliance: DevDock may disclose personal information in response to legitimate legal requests, such as subpoenas, court orders, or government regulations.

Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, personal data may be transferred to the acquiring entity or merged with the assets of the acquiring entity.

privacyPolicy.heading: Data Retention
text: DevDock retains personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a more extended retention period is required or permitted by law. The specific retention period may vary depending on the type of information and the context in which it was collected.

privacyPolicy.heading: Data Security
text: DevDock takes reasonable measures to protect personal data against loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission or storage is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

privacyPolicy.heading: Third-Party Links and Services
text: The site may contain links to third-party websites, applications, or services not owned or controlled by DevDock. This privacy policy does not apply to third-party platforms, and DevDock is not responsible for their privacy practices. DevDock encourages you to review the privacy policies of those third parties before providing any personal data.

privacyPolicy.heading: Children's Privacy
text: The site is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. DevDock does not knowingly collect personal data from children. If DevDock becomes aware that it has inadvertently collected personal data from a child without parental consent, it will delete the information as soon as possible.

privacyPolicy.heading: Your Rights
text: You may have certain rights regarding your data, including the right to access, correct, or delete your information. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this privacy policy.

privacyPolicy.heading: Changes to the Privacy Policy
text: DevDock reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated policy on the site. Your continued use of the site after posting any modifications constitutes your acceptance of the revised privacy policy.

privacyPolicy.heading: Contact Us
text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with us, you can contact DevDock using the contact information provided on the website.
